mutants.code:
def decrypt(enc_string):
    s = 1
    decrypted = ''
    for i in range(len(enc_string)):
        s += ord(enc_string[i])
        decrypted += chr(s)
    return decrypted

    s = -1
    decrypted = ''
    for i in range(len(enc_string)):
        s += ord(enc_string[i])
        decrypted += chr(s)
    return decrypted

def decrypt(enc_string):
    s = 0
    decrypted = 'MUTATED'

def decrypt(enc_string):
    s = 0
    decrypted = ''
    for i in range(len(enc_string)):
        s -= ord(enc_string[i])
        decrypted += chr(s)
    return decrypted

def decrypt(enc_string):
    s = 0
    decrypted = ''
    for i in range(len(enc_string)):
        s += ord(enc_string[i])
        decrypted -= chr(s)
    return decrypted
